SENEVIRATNE – SUDHARSHAN DEEPAL SURESH (Executive Director General of IORA Sri Lanka,​ Secretariat,​ Emeritus Professor of Archeology of the University of Peradeniya,​ Former High Commissioner to India and Bangladesh,​ former Director of the Central Cultural Fund),​ loving husband of Harsha and father of Shavera,​ brother of Professor Harshalal and Chaya,​ brother-in-law of Hiran and Lizzy,​ Udena,​ late Gamini Perera and Dr Manori. His remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 8.30 a.m. onwards on 19th January 2024. Cortege leaves Parlour at 4.00 p.m. on same day for Cremation at General Cemetery Borella at 4.30 p.m. (New Crematorium).
